file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 38-33-01-04 - WASHBASIN DRAIN VALVE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL WASHBASIN DRAIN VALVE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures for the removal/installation of the washbasin drain valve. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 38-33-01-000-801-A WASHBASIN DRAIN VALVE - REMOVAL WASHBASIN DRAIN VALVE - INSTALLA- ALL 38-33-01-400-801-A TION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 38-33-01 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 38-33-01-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. WASHBASIN DRAIN VALVE - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures for the removal of the washbasin drain valve. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 12-15-01-600-802-A/300 WATER TANK - DRAINING C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Lavatory I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Drain the water tank AMM TASK 12-15-01-600-802-A/300. J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Open the door (2). (2) Remove the spring (9) from the washbasin valve actuator lever (10). (3) Loosen the screw (12) that attaches the plunger rod (13) to the clamp (11). (4) Loosen the nut (14) that attaches the washbasin valve actuator lever (10) to the washbasin drain valve (8). (5) Remove the clamp (15) that attaches the clamp-hose (16) to the washbasin drain valve (8). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 38-33-01 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (6) Loosen the nut (7) that attaches the washbasin drain valve (8) to the flange (3). (7) Loosen the nut (6), flat washer (5), and elastomer washer (4) that attach the flange (3) to the washbasin (17). (8) Discard the elastomer washer (4). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 38-33-01 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Washbasin Drain Valve - Removal/Installation Figure 401 ZONES 271 272 A 1. FAUCET 2. DOOR 3. FLANGE B DET. A 4. ELASTOMER WASHER 5. FLAT WASHER 6. NUT 7. NUT 8. WASHBASIN DRAIN VALVE 17. WASHBASIN 14. NUT 9. SPRING 11. CLAMP 12. SCREW 10. WASHBASIN VALVE 15. CLAMP ACTUATOR LEVER 13. PLUNGER ROD 16. CLAMP-HOSE DET. B 145AMM380041.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 38-33-01 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 38-33-01-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. WASHBASIN DRAIN VALVE - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures for the installation of the washbasin drain valve. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 12-15-01-600-801-A/300 WATER TANK - FILLING IPC 38-33-01 WASTE SYSTEM C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expendable Parts IPC REFERENCE ITEM QTY (VENDOR REFERENCE) Elastomer Washer IPC 38-33-01 1 H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Lavatory I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Put the flange (3) in the washbasin (17). (2) Install a new elastomer washer (4), the flat washer (5), and the nut (6) on the flange (3). (3) Tighten the nut (7) that attaches the washbasin drain valve (8) to the flange (3). (4) Tighten the nut (14) that attaches the washbasin valve actuator lever (10) to the washbasin drain valve (8). (5) Tighten the screw (12) that attaches the plumber rod (13) to the clamp (11). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 38-33-01 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (6) Connect the clamp-hose (16) to the washbasin drain valve (8). (7) Tighten the clamp (15) that attaches the clamp-hose (16) to the washbasin drain valve (8). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Service the water tank AMM TASK 12-15-01-600-801-A/300. (2) Operate the faucet and the rod plunger. (3) Check the valve for leaks. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 38-33-01 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
